channel.title: Hacking Adventure Quest
channel.description:
This guide will allow you to make super fast money on adventurequest, or fight a monster of your choice.
Well to do this you need firefox, so if you don't already have that go to [url=http://www.getfirefox.com]www.getfirefox.com[/url].
Then get Tamper Data here: [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/966]https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/966[/url] Once you finish downloading you'll have to restart firefox to continue. [img]http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/3787/tamperrestartci2.png[/img]
Now log into adventure quest and make sure you're on the main screen with the red bar called "Battle Now". Go to Tools and select Tamper Data at the bottom of the drop down.
Click "Start Tamper" and switch back to your adventure quest game. Click "Battle Now" and the game will freeze on the loading screen. Switch back to Tamper Data and you should see this: [img]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/6949/tamperza8.png[/img] Choose Tamper.
You will see a popup that looks like this: [img]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/1696/idju9.png[/img] Note where it says Id=0andabunchofotherstuff. Change the zero to 621 and you'll get a treasure chest with 4800 gold and 100 xp (Different values get different stuff, I haven't experimented enough to tell you other good ones).
Push ok and you will be again asked if you want to tamper with adventure quest. This time uncheck the box and push "Submit". Back on adventure quest it should have now loaded, and you'll be fighting a treasure chest or something else, depending on what you replaced the 0 with.
---Value Table--- 603 = Ziragat (undead dragon) (fucking strong) (4100 gold 1440 xp.) 620 = Buried Treasure! 100xp and 2000 gold 621 = Buried Treasure! 100xp and 4800 gold 622 = Orc Bandit 623 = Umazen Bandit 630 = Demon Knight

item.title: Hacking Adventure Quest
item.dc:creator: @omg_omg_omg omg omg omg
item.description:
@omg_omg_omg wrote:

Found a great new way to hack adventure quest. First, uninstall flash player from your computer if it’s any version other than version 7. Version 7 is required for this hack. Then, download cheat engine version 5.3. Then, install version 7 of flash player. Use cheat engine to hack adventure quest. There are tutorials on youtube, but if none of them help, just send me a message. I’m using it right now, it’s working great![br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 08:39:28 PM[/size][hr]Easy infinite gold. Also, You can change stats, too.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Adventure Quest
item.dc:creator: @existingqwer existingqwer
item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:

avistetto:

ahhh, got my main ban using a hack for temp guardian, so startin new char, anyone know something that gives good exp (1k+) with low hps/is easy to killl

Try 702 it gets you 1100 xp and 550 gold and is relatively easy to kill with good shock attacks. I’m using the current event spell and it’s perfect. The monster has a lot of hp but once you drain like 1/3 of it’s hp it dies automatically.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Adventure Quest
item.dc:creator: @existingqwer existingqwer
item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:

This guide will allow you to make super fast money on adventurequest, or fight a monster of your choice.

Well to do this you need firefox, so if you don’t already have that go to www.getfirefox.com.

Then get Tamper Data here:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/966
Once you finish downloading you’ll have to restart firefox to continue.

Now log into adventure quest and make sure you’re on the main screen with the red bar called “Battle Now”. Go to Tools and select Tamper Data at the bottom of the drop down.

Click “Start Tamper” and switch back to your adventure quest game. Click “Battle Now” and the game will freeze on the loading screen. Switch back to Tamper Data and you should see this:

Choose Tamper.

You will see a popup that looks like this:

Note where it says Id=0andabunchofotherstuff. Change the zero to 621 and you’ll get a treasure chest with 4800 gold and 100 xp (Different values get different stuff, I haven’t experimented enough to tell you other good ones).

Push ok and you will be again asked if you want to tamper with adventure quest. This time uncheck the box and push “Submit”. Back on adventure quest it should have now loaded, and you’ll be fighting a treasure chest or something else, depending on what you replaced the 0 with.

—Value Table—
603 = Ziragat (undead dragon) (fucking strong) (4100 gold 1440 xp.)
620 = Buried Treasure! 100xp and 2000 gold
621 = Buried Treasure! 100xp and 4800 gold
622 = Orc Bandit
623 = Umazen Bandit
630 = Demon Knight
